## <span style="color:  #030303;"> `r fontawesome::fa("mouse-pointer", fill = "#030303")` Tutorials and teaching materials </span>
|  |  |
|:------------------------------------------------|:--------------------|
* [**SPEAQeasy Bioconductor Workshop 2023**](http://research.libd.org/SPEAQeasyWorkshop2023/) to demonstrate how to utilize the outputs of the RNA-seq processing pipeline *SPEAQeasy* in downstream processing and differential gene expression analysis.  

* [**CSHL Statistical Analysis of Genome Scale Data course 2023**](https://lcolladotor.github.io/cshl_rstats_genome_scale_2023/) to teach bulk RNA-seq data processing and exploratory analyses in the CSHL course of 2023.

* [**CSHL Statistical Analysis of Genome Scale Data course 2024**](https://lcolladotor.github.io/cshl_rstats_genome_scale_2024/) to teach differential gene expression with *limma*-*voom* and the basics of spatial transcriptomics in the CSHL course of 2024.
